item.title: Changelog: 4 September 2023
item.description: • Cassette Beasts shrine: Updated the Development History section of the Trivia page.

item.title: Changelog: 30 August 2023
item.description:
• Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine: Added new article: Should You Use The Sith Lords Restored Content Mod in Your First Star Wars: KotOR 2 Playthrough?.
  • Adjusted spacing between each item in the article index lists.
  • Make the date format consistent throughout the entire site by using the Day-Month-Year format.
  • Fixed broken links in the 2022 changelog archive due to the affected pages moved to other parts of the site.

item.title: Should You Use The Sith Lords Restored Content Mod in Your First Star Wars: KotOR 2 Playthrough?
item.author: Leilukin
item.description:
New article on my Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic shrine.

The Sith Lords Restored Content Mod (TSLRCM) is widely regarded as essential for the best experience with Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic II: The Sith Lords, but should you use the mod in your very first KotOR 2 playthrough?

item.title: Changelog: 29 August 2023
item.description:
• Added link button for the site's RSS feed.
  • Fixed the overflow issue of header images.
  • Added custom style for the Site Map page.
  • Improved accessibility of the site's design by customising the CSS :focus selector.

item.title: Changelog: 28 August 2023
item.description:
• A Summer’s End — Hong Kong 1986 shrine: Updated the main page with information about the spiritual sequel In the Ocean I Learned to Float.
  • Cassette Beasts shrine: Adjusted header image and added more images to the home page.
  • Leilukin Hub now has an RSS feed.
